transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, main theek hoon, kaise hain?
Executive: Ji, good morning sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Bas, theek hai, aap bataiye.
Executive: Main bhi badhiya hoon sir. Aaj hum thoda sa baith ke abhi hum kar le sir? Aapka aaj kar lete hain kaam complete, fir proper se aap agle hafte pura use kijiye acche se, fir aap mujhe bataiyega ki kaisa kya chal raha hai sir.
Customer: Filhaal toh aap dekh lijiye ek baar ki kya kya hua, nahi hua. Actually hum subah se ek, subah ek dedh ghante hum baith ke apan khud se jitna ho sake utna kiya, theek hai na?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan, baaki aap. Theek hai sir, baaki ek kaam karta hoon main apne side se jitna main dekh le raha hoon, jitna bhi aapke catalog mein work hai, main woh saara work complete kar deta hoon. But mujhe sir aap se kuch cheezein jaanni hain, jaise ki sir sabse pehle yeh bataiye ki jo aapki rating and review hai, aap kya buyers se rating and review lete hain sir? Maangte hain khud se saamne se?
Customer: Haan, haan, maangte hain.
Executive: Yeh toh acchi baat hai, jaise ki abhi aapka current jo score chal, rating chal raha hai woh 4.7 chal raha hai, theek hai?
Customer: Toh koshish kijiye ki sir. Pehle, pehle, pehle eight hota tha humara rating.
Executive: Sir, eight ho hi nahi sakta na, rating humesha paanch se hi milta hai, matlab paanch mein se hi aapko rating milta hai, jo ki paanch mein se aapka 4.7 hai aur total aapko jo review mila hai woh 139, 139 review mila hai. Yeh acchi baat hai, yeh galat nahi hai, bahut accha aapka rating chal raha hai, but haan, isko maintain rakhiye, aage jitne bhi logon se baat hoti hai, deal hota hai, har ek logon se apne catalog mein rating and review lijiye sir.
Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur mujhe aap ek cheez aur bataiye sir, jaise ki aapne sir kal bhi kuch buyleads aapne purchase ki hongi, correct?
Customer: Consume nahi ho pa raha hai bhaiya, woh deal crack nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Deal, dekhiye sir, deal crack karna, deal crack karne ka aur ek hota hai ki relevant buylead consume karne ka, theek hai? Main wohi jaanna chaah raha hoon jaise ki kal aapne jo lead consume ki sir, theek hai? Maan lijiye aapne chaar paanch lead consume ki jaise ki main dekh raha hoon aapne aaj bhi ek consume ki hai, 21 November ko bhi aur 20 November ko aapne consume ki thi Vijayawada ka tha, leechi plant ka, Shiva naam ka. Toh inse kya kuch discussion hua tha aapki?
Customer: Woh chhote ne kiya hai, mera chhota bhai ne kiya hai, pata nahi usne kya kiya nahi kiya. Haan.
Executive: Accha, accha. Theek hai, ek baar aap unse feedback lo. Haan, ek baar aap unse feedback lo sir ki apne chhote bhai se ki yaar kal tumne itne itne buyleads purchase kiye hain, paanch che buyleads mujhe dikh rahi hai jo aapne kal se bhai ne aapne uthaya hai. Toh ek baar unse feedback lo ki yaar tumne itne lead uthaye hain, inka kya feedback nikla? Samajh gaye?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek baar feedback leke aap mujhe bataiyega Ranjit ji dekhiye maine yeh buylead consume kiya tha aur iska yeh feedback nikla. Deal convert hone mein sir dekho deal convert hone mein toh ek do din ka time lage, lagta hi hai, aisa nahi ki koi requirement aaya, consume kiye aur deal final ho gaya. Theek hai? Thoda sa wahan par buyer ko bhi dikhta hai ki kitna competition hai, buyer ko har ek log dikhai dete hain jitne bhi IndiaMART mein listed hain. Toh woh thoda sa time lenge.
But haan, apne side se aap thoda jo buylead consume kar rahe ho jaise ki aapne mujhse kal question pucha ki main ab ek hafte mein kitna lead, har din kitna lead consume kar sakta hoon. Toh aap har din koshish karo ki paanch che lead ya saat lead jo aapke kaam ki lead hai woh aap consume karo zyada se zyada sir.
Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur main koshish karunga ki kuch aur bhi category hain jo aapke product se related hai, main woh category bhi add karunga jaise ki kal maine do teen category aapne add bhi kiya hai proper tarike se kya kehte hain tea plant ka yeh sab add kiya hai. Toh I think uska bhi aapko.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ranjit ji line pakad ke baithiye ek minute.
Executive: Theek hai sir, main line pe hoon.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aap ek kaam kijiye subah mein hum 95, 95 bana ke rakha hai, usme word likhna baaki hai, keyword nahi hota hai. Ek ek product ka teen naam hota hai na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, woh sab thoda check kariye aap.
Executive: Main dekhiye category mein add kar dunga, theek hai? But mera yeh concern hai ki jaise ki aapne bola ki mere paas direct call nahi aa rahi hai, theek hai?
Customer: Haan. Main direct call ko badhane ki, haan, direct call aapne mujhe bataya aur ek lead aapka convert nahi ho raha, theek hai? Lead convert karne ke liye main aapke product mein kuch category naya add karunga ki aapke paas aur relevant lead aaye aur aapke paas aur genuine buyer aaye. Dusra category add karne se aapka yeh bhi fayda hoga, product add karne se ki aapka direct inquiry bhi badhega sir. Toh yeh dono kaam main aapko proper tarike se aapko dikh jaayega ki haan Ranjit ne kiya hai, theek hai? And dusri cheez sir jo mujhe ek cheez discuss karni hai ki jaise ki sir filter lagana hota hai, order value lagana hota hai, jaise ki aap lagate hain ki nahi lagate hain sir?
Customer: Lagata hai sir.
Executive: Lagate hain? Okay, and aaj subah se aapne koi bhi valid dekhiye sir, check ki valid aa rahi hai, aaj ki kaun kaun si life valid chal rahi hai, woh aapne check kiya?
Customer: Sab check karta hai bhaiya, toh kaam chaliye aap, hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Dekhiye kal raat se ek bhi inquiry nahi aaya hai shayad ab tak.
Executive: Sir, abhi just 8 minute pehle ek Kamini plant karke aaya hai 20,000 piece ka, Surat Gujarat ka. Lead, lead ka baat nahi kar rahe, aap lead ka baat nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Aap direct call ki baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Inquiry, inquiry ho ya call.
Executive: Haan ji. Direct inquiry ki baat kar rahe hain ki kal se nahi aaya hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ek minute sir, main bhi woh bhi check kar le raha hoon. Ek minute. 20 November.
Executive: 20 November kal tha. 20 November ko sir aap check karna ek Sony, Sonic Foods se aapko direct inquiry aayi hai, organic kali haldi, black turmeric.
Customer: Yeh bechne ke liye, yeh bechne ke liye tha, isse bechna hai kali haldi.
Executive: Accha, isko unko bechna tha.
Executive: Aur ek aapka Dohat se aaya tha sir, Dohat se, fast growth green white sandalwood plant, inse baat hua tha Nilesh naam tha.
Customer: Kahan ka, Bihar ka hai na?
Executive: Nilesh, Dohat kahan ka hai sir? Dohat Bihar mein padta hai?
Customer: Main na ek kaam karta hoon, hello. Thoda aadha ghanta rest le leta hoon, baad mein phone karta hoon, bahut thaka hua hoon.
Executive: Theek hai, no problem. Suniye, suniye, aap koi baat nahi, aap rest le kar lo, theek hai? Main aapka saara kaam kar deta hoon aur shaam ko ek baar main khud hi call karke aapko update bhi kar dunga, theek hai? Toh aap shaam tak aap use karo service aur ek baar Monday se na sir, proper tarike se working karo, kahin bhi koi dikkat lagegi Monday se, aap mujhe na directly call karna, jo mera WhatsApp number hai, usi WhatsApp number pe aap mujhe directly call kar lena.
Customer: Bhaiya IndiaMART aisa hota hai, IndiaMART ko na toh Sunday hota hai, na toh Monday hota hai, daily ka daily customer aata hai, bas. IndiaMART ke liye koi official time nahi rehta hai, Ravivar ko bhi ho jaata hai.
Executive: Woh toh 100, woh toh 110% sahi hai sir, theek hai? Lekin humara Saturday Sunday off rehta hai, theek hai? Ab jaise Saturday Sunday main kahin market ya bahar gaya. Haan, hum toh bhaiya 24 ghanta laga hua hai, ek aad customer aa jaaye, deal ho jaaye, bas nahi ho pa raha hai. Main apni aur aapki baat kar raha hoon, main aapki aur apni baat kar raha hoon jaise ki maan lijiye ki aap yeh teen din use karo, aapko koi bhi dikkat dikhta hai ya fir aapko Saturday ko bhi dikkat dikh raha hai ya Sunday ko bhi dikh raha hai, mera WhatsApp number jo hai aap mujhe usme call kar lena ki Ranjit ji thoda sa aap do minute baat kar lo, yeh yeh dikkat ho rahi hai batao kaise kya karna hoga ki sahi ho jaaye. Theek hai, aap mere personal number mein call karna, message karna sir. Theek hai, mera yeh concern hai. Haan, aap apna personal number se aap. Kal maine aapko WhatsApp toh kiya tha personal number se aapko.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, hum aapko ek ghante mein phone kar rahe hain, theek hai. Okay, theek hai. Abhi aapka catalog mein kar dunga. Theek hai, no issue, but aap se mera ek request.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buyleads are not converting into deals.

- Customer is not receiving direct calls.

- Wants to know how many leads to consume daily.



Resolution:

- Executive will add more relevant categories.

- Executive will check why direct calls are not coming.

- Executive advised to take feedback from his brother.

- Executive will call the customer in the evening.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after taking rest.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, rating, reviews, direct inquiry
